name: Pasta Carbonara
description:
Submission for UCI GDIM 33 Spring 2022 Final Prototype Project.

A small vignette game about making pasta carbonara. Fry the bacon, whisk the egg and cheese together, and mix the pasta in the pan for a delicious meal!

A game made by Eric Park and Kenneth Tang. 

Sound effects & music from Freesound and Pixabay. 

Font is Gaegu, made by JIKJI SOFT and downloaded from Google Fonts. 

All other art assets are made by us.
